name: Zoop To The Future! - A Time Traveling, Point-n-Click Adventure Game for PC/Mac/iPad!
blurb: A hilarious PC/Mac/iPad game that takes Prickley Pete, a ghost, and his two best friends to multiple times periods and locales!

rewards.reward: A copy of "Zoop To The Future!" on PC/Mac (iPad Coming Soon!) + "Executive Producer" Credit in the game + Prickley Pete will make you a personalized "Thank You!" video!

A copy of "Zoop To The Future!" on PC/Mac (iPad Coming Soon!) + "Executive Producer" Credit in the game + A set of three (3) Prickley Pete, Joey, and Danny pins + Prickley Pete will make you a personalized "Thank You!" video!
